title: Unicorn on a Stick
summaries: The Unicorn on a Stick is a Hardmode novelty item which, when selected, is held stationary in front of the player to provide the illusion that they are riding a unicorn. It has no real function, unlike the Unicorn Mount.
It can be dropped by <linked>Unicorns</linked> with a 1% drop chance.

statistics.Sell: 1 SC
